title: Old infura project id is in logcat after upgrade to infura hotfix 0.9.32
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: After upgrade from 0.9.32 hotfix 2 to infura hotfix (build 3) there is old infura project id `z6GCTmjdP3FETEJmMBI4 ` instead of new `f315575765b14720b32382a61a89341a ` in the logcat. Expected that everywhere it's new project id
```

```


### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Install 0.9.32 fro playstore, create account, log in, close app
- Upgrade to infura hotfix, log in
- Check logcat

#### Logs

logcat:
